name: How Artificial Intelligence Can Improve Healthcare - Dr. Nigam Shah 2023
descriptionShort: Dr. Nigam Shah is an Associate Professor of Medicine (Biomedical Informatics) at Stanford University, and he will tell us about how Artificial Intelligence can improve healthcare.

name: Exploiting AI-Generated Code - Snyk 2023
descriptionShort: Simon Maple (Head of AI advocacy) and Sonya Patch (Senior Security Advocate) created together a presentation about AI-Generated code and how to exploit it. They used ChatGPT and Co-Pilot to generate code and by the help of Snyk, they were able to find vulnerabilities in the code.

name: Unveiling RedwoodJS: Streamlining Web Development from Adam Juran - 2023
descriptionShort: Adam Juran, a software developer since 1998, will tell us about RedwoodJS, a full-stack framework for building and deploying web applications.

name: The hidden benefits of Flutter from Fré Dumazy - 2023
descriptionShort: Fré Dumazy is a software developer since 2012, founder of Skystone Apps and he will tell us about the hidden benefits of Flutter.

name: The Creation Of This Site
descriptionShort: Creating a portfolio website is a journey of self-discovery, a process of weaving together a tapestry of skills and experiences. Let me take you on a tour of my journey, from the initial spark of inspiration to the final product.

name: Improving User Experience: Insights from ISO Consultant Hendrik Manhaeve - 2023
descriptionShort: Explore the latest in UX and UI design with Hendrik Manhaeve, a consultant at the International Standardization Organization (ISO) and a board member of the ISA Belgian chapter.
